name: HireRight
description:
HireRight delivers global background checks, drug testing, and employment verification services through an innovative platform. We want all of our clients to grow successfully and efficiently – no matter their size or location. 

We do this by offering a comprehensive screening solution that can be tailored to the unique needs of any organization, giving enterprises peace of mind about their people and processes. Our platform is easy to use and can be integrated with existing HR systems.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Trusted to be the world's global partner for background screening.
ShortDescription: Speed. Precision. Innovation. That’s how you hire right!

Highlights.name: Global ID Check
Highlights.description: Validates your candidate's passport or national identity document to determine if it is authentic

Highlights.name: Global Employment Verification
Highlights.description: Verifies employment history provided by your candidate with employers or other authorised agents around the world

Highlights.name: Social Media Search
Highlights.description: Searches publicly available social media profiles and content to help identify potentially adverse behaviours

enhanced_description: HireRight offers a comprehensive global screening solution delivered through an innovative and easy-to-use platform. It provides essential services like criminal background checks, financial background checks, due diligence services, drug and health screening, global ID verification, global employment verification, and social media searches. Designed to be tailored to the unique needs of any organization, it aims to help clients hire top talent faster and more efficiently, integrating seamlessly with existing HR systems to provide peace of mind regarding their people and processes.
key_use_cases: Drug and health screening for candidates
Social media screening for adverse behavior
Optimizing hiring processes for speed and efficiency
competitive_advantages: Focus on speed and precision in screening
Trusted global partner for background screening
roi_benefits: Increased peace of mind regarding workforce
scalability_features: Supports organizations of various sizes and locations
Comprehensive solution tailorable to unique organizational requirements
